description: Sets the retention of the specified log group. With a retention policy, you can configure the number of days for which to retain log events in the specified log group.

parameters.name: logGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the log group.

parameters.name: retentionInDays
parameters.description: The number of days to retain the log events in the specified log group. Possible values are: 1, 3, 5, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 365, 400, 545, 731, 1096, 1827, 2192, 2557, 2922, 3288, and 3653. To set a log group so that its log events do not expire, use DeleteRetentionPolicy.
